template: The pen is mightier [MASK] the sword, communication is key
Don't put the cart before the [MASK] do things in order
Where there's [MASK] there's fire, trust your instincts
The grass is always [MASK] on the other side
When the going [MASK] tough, the tough get going
A watched [MASK] never boils, be patient and give it time
Every cloud has a silver [MASK] keep looking up
Rome [MASK] built in a day, patience is key
Don't count your [MASK] before they hatch, avoid assumptions
The apple doesn't fall far from the tree, [MASK] parent like child
Absence makes the heart grow fonder, [MASK] can be good
Birds [MASK] a feather flock together, find like-minded people
All work and no [MASK] makes Jack a dull boy
Don't bite the hand [MASK] feeds you, show some gratitude
The proof of the pudding [MASK] in the eating
If it ain't broke, [MASK] fix it, leave well enough alone
A stitch in time saves [MASK] take care of problems promptly
Beggars can't be [MASK] take what you can get
The proof is in the [MASK] results matter most
Birds of a feather flock together, find [MASK] tribe
